ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence vocabulary raw score
Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence vocabulary T score
Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence matrix raw score
Wechsler Abbreviated Scale of Intelligence matrix T score
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List A, first attempt.
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List A, Second attempt.
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List A, first attempt.
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List A, first attempt.
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List A, first attempt.
RAVLT: Number of correct immediately recalled words for List B.
RAVLT: Number of correct recalled words for List A, immediately after recall of List B, without the words being reread.
RAVLT: Number of correct recalled words for List A, after a dealy of 20-60 min
RAVLT: Time in min of the delay between the last delayed recall of List A (i.e., Delayed Recall Trial 1) and the second one (i.e., Delay Recall Trial 2)
RAVLT: Number of intrusions for list A.
RAVLT: Number of correctly identified words from List A during recognition phase of RAVLT
RAVLT: Number of words wrongly identified from List B, during List A recognition phase.
RAVLT: During List A recognition phase, number of words that are semantically associated but wrongly identified.
RAVLT: During List A recognition phase, number of words that are phonetically associated but wrongly identified.
Number of words the participant correctly reads from the list, in 45 seconds.
Number of times the participant correctly says the color from the list, in 45 seconds.
Number of times the participant correctly says the ink color of (color) words from a list, in 45 seconds.
Time (in seconds) to complete Trail A.
Time (in seconds) to complete Trail B.
Self-reported handedness (R/L)
Notes: 1 = Right; 2 = Left; 3 = Both; -999 = N/A or missing

ElementDescription: Time (in seconds) that participant takes to fill all the grooves on the pegboard using their right hand.
Number of pegs dropped while using right hand.
Time (in seconds) that the participant takes to fill all the grooves on the pegboard using their left hand.
Number of pegs dropped while using left hand.
Raw sum of the Forward item scores (reflecting the number of correct trials) for all the digit sequences produced by the subject.
Raw number of digits recalled on the last Forward trial scored 1 point.
Raw sum of the Backward item scores (reflecting the number of correct trials) for all the digit sequences produced by the subject.
Raw number of digits recalled on the last Backward trial scored 1 point.
Raw sum of the Sequencing item scores (reflecting the number of correct trials) for all the digit sequences produced by the subject.
Raw number of digits recalled on the last Sequencing trial scored 1 point.
Raw sum of the item scores for all three tasks (i.e., Forward, Backward, and Sequencing).
